title: Start a breaktime timer — breaktime
text: work_time [numeric(1)] length time working session. Defaults 25 minutes. short_break_multiplier [numeric(1)] length short break compared preceding working session. Defaults one fifth (example, 25 minute working session followed 5 minute short break). long_break_frequency [numeric(1)] number working sessions long break. Defaults 4. start_color, end_color [character(1)] Colors used display time. time displayed start_color time remaining, end_color timer expired. Passed cli::make_ansi_style(). Defaults "green" "red", respectively. sound [numeric(1)] [character(1)] sound played beepr::beep() timer ends. See beepr::beep() possible values. NULL, sound disabled. timer expired ended, sound play time one-fifth target time passes (example, session lasts 25 minutes, reminder sound play every 5 minutes session ends). units [character(1)] Units used interpreting numeric time period arguments. Defaults "minutes". Accepted units "seconds", "minutes", "hours", "days", "weeks", "fortnights", "months", "years", "decades", "centuries", "millennia" (abbreviations thereof).

title: Start a breaktime timer — breaktime
text: Invisibly returns R6 object class BreakTime.
